ul.li: Paweł Kowalik: Wspomaganie tworzenia analizatorów stron wyników z internetowych systemów wyszukujących (Automated support for search engine wrapper induction.), Master thesis, Poznań University of Technology, 2003, [in Polish, PDF, 3.2MB]
Stanisław Osiński: An Algorithm for Clustering of Web Search Results, Master thesis, Poznań University of Technology, 2003, [in English, PDF, 4.7MB]
Michał Wróblewski: A Hierarchical WWW Pages Clustering Algorithm Based on the Vector Space Model, Master thesis, Poznań University of Technology, 2003, [in English, PDF, 8.5MB]
Steven Schockaert: Het Clusteren van Zoekresultaten met behulp van Vaagmieren (Clustering of Search Results using Fuzzy Ants), Master thesis, University of Ghent, 2004, [in Dutch, PDF, 3.5MB]
Ngo Chi Lang: A tolerance rough set approach to clustering web search results, Faculty of Mathematics, Informatics and Mechanics, Warsaw University, 2004, [in English, PDF, 1.3MB]
